author: Kabbi
description: Brings all your Zigbee devices to the gateway through MQTT bridge
name: Zigbee2MQTT

auto_update.description: Automatically try to update zigbee2MQTT to the latest version.

mqtt.description: Mosquitto or other mqtt server host/port to connect to

serial_port.description: The serial port ID of the zigbee USB stick you are using. Normally this is: /dev/ttyACM0

debug.description: Used to find issues if this addon isn't working properly. If enabled, you can find more details about its functioning in the internal log (found under settings -> development).
